mapper.select: select count(*) from email e where e.em_from = #{email} and e.em_status = 'Y'

select e.em_no , e.em_title , to_char(e.em_enroll_date, '""MM"월"DD"일 ("DY") "HH24":"mi""') em_enroll_date , e.em_inp , e.em_status from email e where em_from = #{email} and e.em_status = 'Y' order by e.em_no desc

select e.em_no , e.em_from , e.em_title , e.em_content , to_char(e.em_enroll_date, '""YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일 ("DAY") "HH24":"mi":"SS"""') em_enroll_date , e.em_inp , e.em_status from email e where e.em_From = #{emFrom} and e.em_no = #{emNo} and e.em_status = 'Y'
select ea.em_att_no , ea.em_origin_name , ea.em_change_name from email_attach ea where ea.em_no = #{emNo} order by ea.em_att_no
select count(*) from email_recipient er where er.em_to = #{email} and er.em_status='Y'

select em_no , er.em_rec_no , er.em_read , er.em_inp , er.em_status , e.em_from , e.em_title , to_char(e.em_enroll_date, '""MM"월"DD"일 ("DY") "HH24":"mi""') em_enroll_date from email_recipient er join email e using(em_no) where er.em_to = #{email} and er.em_status='Y' order by er.em_rec_no desc

select em_no , er.em_rec_no , er.em_to , er.em_inp , er.em_status , e.em_from , e.em_title , e.em_content , to_char(e.em_enroll_date, '""YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일 ("DAY") "HH24":"mi":"SS"""') em_enroll_date from email_recipient er join email e using(em_no) where er.em_to = #{emTo} and er.em_rec_no = #{emRecNo} and er.em_status='Y'

select ea.em_att_no , ea.em_origin_name , ea.em_change_name from email_recipient er join email e using (em_no) join email_attach ea using(em_no) where er.em_to = #{emTo} and er.em_rec_no = #{emRecNo} and er.em_status='Y' order by ea.em_att_no
